TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleInformation extends System.Object
public ref class VisualStyleInformation abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供作業系統目前視覺化樣式的資訊。

span.span: Provides information about the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會公開`static`可提供有關目前作業系統的視覺化樣式的詳細資料的屬性。This class exposes `static` properties that provide details about the current visual style of the operating system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的值中的屬性控制項。The following code example displays the values of the properties in a control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Author { get; }
.property string Author
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Author As String
public: static property System::String ^ Author { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前視覺化樣式的作者。

span.span: Gets the author of the current visual style.

value.span: 如果啟用視覺化樣式，則為指定目前視覺化樣式作者的字串，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: A string that specifies the author of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會檢查值屬性在內部。This property checks the value of the property internally.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ColorScheme { get; }
.property string ColorScheme
Public Shared ReadOnly Property ColorScheme As String
public: static property System::String ^ ColorScheme { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前視覺化樣式的色彩配置。

span.span: Gets the color scheme of the current visual style.

value.span: 如果啟用視覺化樣式，則為指定目前視覺化樣式色彩配置的字串，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: A string that specifies the color scheme of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows XP 視覺化樣式提供三種色彩配置。The Windows XP visual style provides three color schemes. 此屬性會傳回"NormalColor 「 藍色的色彩配置為作用中，如果"HomeStead"黃褐色綠色的色彩配置為作用中，且 「 金屬 「 銀級色彩配置是否作用中。This property returns "NormalColor" if the blue color scheme is active, "HomeStead" if the olive green color scheme is active, and "Metallic" if the silver color scheme is active.

span.span: A string that specifies the company that created the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

span.span: Gets the color that the current visual style uses to indicate the hot state of a control.

value.span: 如果啟用視覺化樣式，則會使用 在作用中狀態的控制項上繪製反白顯示，否則會使用 。

span.span: If visual styles are enabled, the used to paint a highlight on a control in the hot state; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得值，指出使用者是否在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system.

value.span: 如果使用者在支援視覺化樣式的作業系統中啟用樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in an operating system that supports them; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以啟用視覺化樣式中的**外觀** 索引標籤**顯示**控制台 中的選項。Users can enable visual styles in the **Appearance** tab of the **Display** option in Control Panel. 這個屬性會檢查值屬性在內部。This property checks the value of the property internally.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system supports visual styles.

value.span: 如果作業系統支援視覺化樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the operating system supports visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有 Windows XP Home Edition、 Windows XP Professional 和 Windows Server 2003 才支援視覺化樣式。Visual styles are supported only on Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003.
